name: part_010
file: tmp_【 #沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE 】沙花叉クロヱと不思議なキノコ 【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [rvIy1IOZNtA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Transition between songs with a brief blackout and stage reset.
Performance of the song '右左右君右下上目きゅるんめちょかわ！' (Migihidari Kimi Migishita Uwame Kyurun Mechokawa!).
scenes.song_name: 右左右君右下上目きゅるんめちょかわ！

subtitles.original: 大好きでしょ
subtitles.english: You love it, right?

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの いっぱい いっぱい いっぱい 愛して
subtitles.english: What's wrong? Love me more and more and more.

subtitles.original: 私だけの君じゃなきゃね 嫌だよ
subtitles.english: It's no good if you're not mine alone.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 君は ねぇ 誰になついてるんだろう
subtitles.english: Hey, who are you getting attached to?

subtitles.original: ねぇ 私が君にあげた首輪はしたまま
subtitles.english: Hey, keep on the collar I gave you.

subtitles.original: おはようってキスをしたら
subtitles.english: If we kiss and say good morning...

subtitles.original: さわり合って 二人の時間
subtitles.english: Touching each other, our time together.

subtitles.original: なーのに私だけじゃ足りないの？
subtitles.english: But am I not enough on my own?

subtitles.original: これが俗に言う 執着か
subtitles.english: Is this what's commonly called obsession?

subtitles.original: あいつがいけないんだね
subtitles.english: It's that person's fault, isn't it?

subtitles.original: アドレからの通知音 忍び音
subtitles.english: The notification sound from 'Adore', a stealthy sound.

subtitles.original: 壊しちゃっていいかしら
subtitles.english: Is it okay if I break it?

subtitles.original: 言い訳ばっかり 見苦しいわ
subtitles.english: Just excuses, it's unsightly.

subtitles.original: あれもこれも煩わしいわ
subtitles.english: This and that, it's all so bothersome.

subtitles.original: お仕置きしちゃわなきゃね きいてるの？
subtitles.english: I have to punish you. Are you listening?

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの ずっと ずっと ずっと 好きだよ
subtitles.english: What's wrong? I'll love you forever, forever, forever.

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの ちゃんと ちゃんと ちゃんと 愛して
subtitles.english: What's wrong? Love me properly, properly, properly.

subtitles.original: 君以外なんていらない ねぇ 嫌だよ
subtitles.english: I don't need anyone but you. No way.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 君は 私のものなんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, you are mine.

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの ずっと ずっと ずっと 好きだよ
subtitles.english: What's wrong? I'll love you forever, forever, forever.

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの ちゃんと ちゃんと ちゃんと 愛して
subtitles.english: What's wrong? Love me properly, properly, properly.

subtitles.original: 君以外なんていらない ねぇ 嫌だよ
subtitles.english: I don't need anyone but you. No way.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 君は 私のものなんだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, you are mine.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 君が 裏切るなら わかってるよね
subtitles.english: Hey, if you betray me, you know what happens, right?

subtitles.original: 右左右君右下上目きゅるんめちょかわ！
subtitles.english: Right-Left-Right, you, Bottom-Right-Up eyes, so sparkly and cute!

subtitles.original: タイガー！サイバー！ファイバー！ダイバー！バイバー！ジャージャー！
subtitles.english: Tiger! Cyber! Fiber! Diver! Viber! Jya-jya!

subtitles.original: あれやこれや言ったって 結局世はごめんじゃん
subtitles.english: No matter what's said, in the end the world says 'sorry'.

subtitles.original: ずっとそばにいるなんて 正直ムリゲーってじゃん
subtitles.english: Being by your side forever is honestly an impossible game.

subtitles.original: あの頃よりも上なんて 大体背伸びのフリじゃん
subtitles.english: Being better than back then is mostly just pretending to be taller.

subtitles.original: マヂな話噛んだって リュックの中身パンパンじゃん
subtitles.english: Even if I mess up serious talk, my backpack is stuffed full.

subtitles.original: でも でも 君となら
subtitles.english: But, but, if it's with you...

subtitles.original: 目と目 すぐで 一途に 心掴み その中に
subtitles.english: Eyes meeting instantly, wholeheartedly catching your heart inside.

subtitles.original: 見て 頭の先から爪まで ウーガのナチュラルスタイル
subtitles.english: Look, from the top of my head to my nails, Wuga's natural style.

subtitles.original: 調子に乗ってあちこんで 泣いちゃう日もあるけど
subtitles.english: Getting carried away and falling, there are days I cry, but...

subtitles.original: さらけらん 触れらん 君だけ 補正あれば撃ち込め
subtitles.english: Can't reveal, can't touch, just you. If there's a correction, shoot it in.

subtitles.original: 爆風 目風は決めたら 文句はこれでないね
subtitles.english: If the blast and wind are decided, there are no complaints, right?

subtitles.original: 右左右君右下上目きゅるんめちょかわ！
subtitles.english: Right-Left-Right, you, Bottom-Right-Up eyes, so sparkly and cute!

subtitles.original: 斜め右 あざとさとペロ まじだお めちょかわいい
subtitles.english: Slanted right, calculating and sticking out my tongue. Seriously, so cute!

subtitles.original: 夜更かし 極めて 逆に健康だ！
subtitles.english: Staying up late to the extreme, conversely, I'm healthy!

subtitles.original: ちっぽけ 卑屈すぎます 炎上だけはカンベンです
subtitles.english: Too small and self-deprecating. Please, just no flame wars.

subtitles.original: そうは言われても約束できない 好きなことだけ爆速でいたい
subtitles.english: Even if you say that, I can't promise. I want to do only what I like at top speed.

subtitles.original: わんこも大好きです 今日も生きてて偉いちゃんです
subtitles.english: I love puppies too. You're a good kid for living today.

subtitles.original: 褒められると申し訳ない 期待した潜った人間ですし
subtitles.english: I feel bad being praised. I'm just a person who stayed hidden.

subtitles.original: でも でも 君だから
subtitles.english: But, but, because it's you...

subtitles.original: 時間は すぐに 一途に 心揺らす 君のために
subtitles.english: Time goes by fast, wholeheartedly shaking my heart for you.

subtitles.original: ほら 頭の先から爪まで ウーガのナチュラルスタイル
subtitles.english: Look, from the top of my head to my nails, Wuga's natural style.

subtitles.original: うそじゃん パジャマのままだし 驚く日もあるけど
subtitles.english: No way, I'm still in pajamas. There are days I'm surprised, but...

subtitles.original: でもいつでも選ぶは君だけ 補正ないけど撃ち抜け
subtitles.english: But I'll always choose only you. No correction, but shoot through.

subtitles.original: 調子に乗ってもいいよね 文句は後で聞きます
subtitles.english: It's okay to get carried away, right? I'll listen to complaints later.

subtitles.original: 右左右君右下上目きゅるんめちょかわ！
subtitles.english: Right-Left-Right, you, Bottom-Right-Up eyes, so sparkly and cute!

subtitles.original: 斜め右 あざとさとペロ まじだお めちょかわいい
subtitles.english: Slanted right, calculating and sticking out my tongue. Seriously, so cute!
